headline: Think Open Fellowship
paragraph: The call for 2021-22 Think Open Fellowships is now open. Apply by May 28th for this great opportunity to make an impact on education affordability!

headline: Summer Schedule
paragraph: The Library has new summer hours. Check our schedule for all the details!

headline: Chat help is now available 24/7!
paragraph: Get help from a librarian 24 hours a day, 7 days week via chat--we'll help you find articles, books, and more!

headline: Library Instruction
paragraph: Librarians offer instruction sessions on dozens of topics. Browse expertise and request a classroom session!

headline: Library Statement on Racism
paragraph: The U of I Library Commits to Acting Against Racism.

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
